attributes.action: stop putting all young people into one "yob" catagory, and make sure the media stop this also
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am 14, I am fed up with all young people being placed in one catagory. The news concentrates on "yob culture" as does the government. I would like to see more focus placed on the law abiding youth.
